channel.title: CVE Feed for ProcessMaker -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ProcessMaker -- all products

item.title: CVE-2016-9045|2024-08-06T02:42:09.425Z -- processmaker -- processmaker%20enterprise
item.description: A code execution vulnerability exists in ProcessMaker Enterprise Core 3.0.1.7-community. A specially crafted web request can cause unsafe deserialization potentially resulting in PHP code being executed. An attacker can send a crafted web parameter to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2016-9048|2024-08-06T02:42:09.816Z -- processmaker -- processmaker%20enterprise
item.description: Multiple exploitable SQL Injection vulnerabilities exists in ProcessMaker Enterprise Core 3.0.1.7-community. Specially crafted web requests can cause SQL injections. An attacker can send a web request with parameters containing SQL injection attacks to trigger this vulnerability, potentially allowing exfiltration of the database, user credentials and in certain setups access the underlying operating system.
